article:
'PLP' may stand for: *Personalized Learning Programme *Packet Layer Protocol, a
network layer protocol *Partner Login Portal, a partner facing web portal
*Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Pasig, a local university in Pasig City, Philippines
*Parliamentary Labour Party, a grouping of British Labour MPs *Peace Love &
Pitbulls, a Swedish industrial rock band *Phantom Limb Pain, the painful
sensation associated with an amputated or missing limb *Physical Layer Pipe,
specified in the DVB-T2 standard *Pi Lambda Phi, International Fraternity *PL/P
; a programming language *Platonic life-partner, a non-sexual partner in a marriage-
like or similar union *Polarized light pollution *Pragati Legislature Party, a
1970s political party in Orissa, India *principle of least privilege, a security
guideline *Progressive Liberal Party, a Bahamian political party *Progressive
Labor Party (USA), a transnational communist party based in the United States
*Progressive Labour Party, an Australian political party *Progressive Labour
Party (Bermuda), a Bermudian political party *Prosopographisches Lexikon der
Palaiologenzeit, a German-language biographical dictionary of the late Byzantine
Empire *Proteolipid protein *Public Leaning Post, slang meaning people leaning
against one another *Purple Lizard Publishing, a recreational map publisher in
Pennsylvania, USA *Pyridoxal phosphate, a coenzyme, the active form of vitamin
B 6 *Pyrotechnic lap pretensioner *PerlPage, a method of embedding
Perl code into HTML *Product Line Profitability, profitability by product line
*Pa La Pinga, vulgar/slang way of saying "Go to hell" e.g. Vete Pa la Pinga!
